esinislam.com was founded and operated by AWQAF Africa

Nature Of esinislam.com

esinislam.com is founded and operated by Awqaf Africa. Like it's founder, esinislam.com sees that the African Muslims communities need an international organization of their own to which they can relate and upon which they can rely

Protecting, supporting, and/or relieving the Muslims against military oppression are definitely parts of the organizations duties

esinislam.com is an independent establishment with a firm principle to stay neutral and distance itself from exploitations by politicians, lobies from business prominent, or affiliations with military strugglings. AWQAF Africa maintains Jihad or Struggling For The Cause of Islam is a faith as well as a duty, and therefore does not champion any struggling other than that of Islam

To uphold the principles, esinislam.com does not register as a beneficiary charity, company, or industry of or under any Law of any country of the world - unless extremely neccessary. However, respecting and abiding to the laws of all sovereignties of nations are as important as the principles of esinislam.com provided such laws do not contravene or jeopardize its main principle of adhering to the Islamic values, traditions, and laws

An increasingly important goal of esinislam.com is to help make the continent a better, safer, and fair place for the Muslims to live. One way the organization works towards this goal is by providing various types of aids for communities and local societies

AWQAF Africa and esinislam.com also works for individual progress in many fields, including provission of sound education, awarding scholarships, offering interest free loans, helping agricultural development, and projecting Islamic schemes for affordable housings. esinislam.com promotes products and markets of the Muslims. esinislam.com helps to develop natural resources and labour forces of people

As Muslims in Africa are getting more and more deprived, poorer and poorer, and more and more vulnerable, esinislam.com believes the Muslims of Africa can only help themselves through an international Muslim organization dedicated to their services

Despite riches of natural resources, future of people in the continent is becoming more and more uncertain. Millions lay the blames on the European colonizations. Many Africans find it difficult to forget or forgive the European traders of slavery. Others realize selfishness, tyranny, mismanagements, and ignorance of their leaders to have plaid significant roles in their long suffering and victimizations

As a result people of Africa despair in efforts of big international organizations such as the United Nations and - even their own - Africa Union (formerly Organization of Africa Unity or OAU). Writers remind of all these to be reasons for the Africans despairing in worlds big relief organizations like Red Cross, Oxfam etc. Ordinary people see the like of International Monetary Fund, The World Heath Organization (WHO), and The World Food Council as just political slogans or big baits by the big nations that they neither trust nor depend upon as they long for a very African reliable body

The policy of neutrality has huge potentials of making esinislam.com more charitable, more humanitarian, and more effective in its works to make a difference and serve as a very African reliable international organization. esinislam.com avoids membership in some international umbrella organizations that may endanger its neutrality

Neutrality of esinislam.com is greatly important in order that the international establishment carries out and carries on relieving the like of victims and prisoners of war and providing them with food and shelter as well as finding them new homes, reuniting them with their families, or giving them necessary medical and social supports

AWQAF Africa and esinislam.com does not pay or take and neither does it appeal for or award interests or usury under any circumstances and for any purpose

There are no approaches to banks for interest based credits or grants. Interest free facilities are accepted from very few (and almost non-existing) banks that operate under strict provisions of Islamic Banking Codes of Practice

If the amounts or effects esinislam.com could give diminishes or are affected as a result of these practices and principles, the aims and objectives are, regardless, accomplished. esinislam.com, which only depends on solutions in Islamic teachings, does not consider any option outside Islamic Law to maximize effects and performances © EsinIslam.Com

Object Of esinisislam.com

esinislam.com, like it founder AWQAF Africa, is an international organization that works to relieve human suffering amongst the Muslims of Africa - in particular and as a primary objective - and around the world - as necessary. The aim is projected for all nations of the continent, especially, their Muslim societies where each national society effectuates programmes of esinislam.com

Relief, human dignity, and spiritual uplift remain main goals of the international body

esinislam.com seeks the causes of suffering, poverty, and Islamophobia and tries to eliminate them under the amiable banner of Islam

Success and failure in works are not allowed to play any negative roles

Helping all Muslims whatever way or means possible is a defined purpose of esinislam.com against all odds of politics, cultures, tribalism, or nationalism

Efforts of esinislam.com are employed to aid people of Africa gain their freedom from foreign exploitations. Better lives for the deprived are not only ultimate aims, but also a message of Islam needing to be propagated and delivered

Disagreement between nations of Africa and beyond does not prevent the establishment from operating effectively, charitably, and above all according to the teaching of Islam in order to serve the whole Muslim World duly

Greater cooperation and interrelationship among national societies ofesinislam.com are promoted, initiated, and commissioned in order to facilitate the Islamic charitable missions in more and more countries without resulting in financial irregularities, troubles, or ill ambitions. Preservation of Islamic values are fundamental principles ofesinislam.com

AWQAF Africa and esinislam.com tries to prevent or minimize misery in time of war, peace, plagues, natural disasters, or prosperities, and serve all Muslims regardless of sects, nationalities, or politics

Thus, AWQAF Africa, in association and under ownership of awqafafrica, works:

v To improve humanitarian relief for the African Muslims

v To protect victims of corruptions, mismanagements, lack of social security, diseases, nationalism, tribalism, etc. in the troubled continent

v To house the poor and disabled as the continent lacks substantial and sustainable national social services

v To supply healthy food for the deprived and ordinary Africans

v To dig wells in villages and towns of Africa

v To open new and support existing clinics, dispensaries, and hospitals in the near and remote part of Africa

v To care for widows, vulnerable elderly, and orphans, especially during the conflicts and natural disasters

v To support victims of natural disasters as well as protect and support victims of deadly diseases such as AIDS

v To fight against epidemics and their causes in the continent

v To train and provide basic clinic supports, first aids, and nursing skills to local people of Africa

v To help make supply and use of medicines available and affordable for the Africans home and abroad

v To discourage and oppose to any armed troops, military attacks, or use of any weapon against the African Muslims anywhere in the world

v To work toward peace and prosperity for the Muslims in Africa

v To deliver justice and advocate for equality between the Africans and other races as taught by Islam

v To visit, support, and serve the African sick, frail, elderly, and disabled people home and abroad

v To maintain the spiritual significance of Islam of the Africans

v To enlighten the African Muslims home and abroad through the teachings of Qur'an and Sunnah

v To open new and support existing Muslim education centres for the Africans

v To build new and support existing schools, colleges, circles, and boards for the African Muslims

v To build new and support existing centres and mosques in the continent - and beyond

v To publish and broadcast literatures on Islam and Muslims affairs

v To carry out general charitable works for relief, peace, development, justice, and betterment of humanity in Africa - and beyond if necessary © EsinIslam.Com

Publications & Intellectual Works Of esinislam.com

AWQAF Africa and esinislam.com provides information about its works to members of national societies, activists, volunteers, donors, and - upon request - the public

Each major association of AWQAF Africa and esinislam.com as well as many of its agencies, issue documents that give a complete account of works done or commissioned

These documents give administrators of ash Shura and national societies information that helps them carry out their duties

AWQAF Africa and esinislam.com also publishes and distributes literatures on Islamic faith - better informing the Africans about how they can attain and maintain everlasting peace and prosperity

AWQAF Africa and esinislam.com issues many publications of interest and enlightens the public for purposes of propagation, accountability, and efficiencies

Booklets from AWQAF Africa and esinislam.com deal with such subjects as knowledge and faith, health and safety, emergencies and rescues, peace and prosperity, or aids and relieves

Many publications of AWQAF Africa and esinislam.com are available in Arabic, English, and French - and in some cases in African languages

AWQAF Africa and esinislam.com has ad Diwan as office of public information, which is part of secretary services in its administrative city, London

Ad diwan is also responsibile for advising and directing information offices of national societies throughout the continent tasked with providing information about AWQAF Africa and esinislam.com to people in nearby regions © EsinIslam.Com
